metadata.name: Hit With Reality
metadata.description:
Shackled by societal pressures, she makes for an easy target of reality & pain from those looking to take advantage. It’s up to her to be willing to bend, but never break.                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                
Hand drawn digital painting  
Software: Procreate                                                                                                                      
5600 × 6694
